lines.text: Does your instrumentation reveal any intelligent life form?
Life form, yes. Intelligent, no.
Get off our backs.
I kinda get off on your front.
Can I get you a doctor or a vanilla milkshake or something?
Am I speaking to the widow of John S. Lamont?
You must be mistaken. I'm not a widow.
The hell you're not!
What do you intend to do during your lifetime?
Well, I was thinking about becoming a nun or a bomber pilot. Or maybe even going into politics.
This could be a very lustful, degenerative, dirty mission... and very dangerous. Allow me to volunteer!
Of all the planets we've ever visited, have you ever seen anything that even remotely looks like you?
No, but...
Exactly. No butt. No lips. No legs. No way!
I'm going to the ladies room... Try not to kill anyone before I get back.
Someone should tell Babs to stop using that industrial strength hairspray!
Hey, you cute little greasemonkey, how would you like to tickle my carburetor?
Sorry, exhaustbreath, I don't work on compacts.
I wanna know where that alphabet creep is.
I think I know somebody's who's jealous.
Why would I be jealous of someone who's about to become recently deceased?
I'm an alien.
Well, that's okay, there's lots of English bands. What about Menudo?
I guess it's not surprising I'd fall for an alien. Lois Lane fell for Superman. Uh, there've been lots of mixed couples like that. Fay Wray and King Kong...
I still can't believe you're an alien. What a novelty act!
